Text.Text_Ko: 날이 갈수록 더 잘하고 있어. 정말 훌륭한 대처였는걸?
Text.Text_En: You're getting better every day. That was really impressive handling.
The forest should be safe now.

Item.Text_En: It was a rewarding day again.
A mosquito that big... it was horrifying.

Text.Text_Ko: (그때, 당신에게 의미를 알 수 없는 이상한 목소리가 들려온다.)
Text.Text_En: (At that moment, you hear a strange voice whose meaning you can't understand.)

Text.Text_Ko: (당신은 놀라며 그 소리에 집중해 보지만, 단어의 의미를 이해할 수 없다. 머리가 어지럽고, 이상한 기분이 든다.)
Text.Text_En: (You focus on the sound in surprise, but can't make sense of the words. Your head spins and you feel strange.)
Hmm, maybe it's just because you're tired...

Text.Text_Ko: 오늘은 푹 쉬고 내일부터 다시 시작하자.
Text.Text_En: Let's rest today and start again tomorrow.
